MSc and BSc students

If you’re interested in working with us on your master or bachelor projects, do get in touch!

PhDs and postodcs

We currently have no open funded PhD and postdoctoral positions. However, if you’re interested in joining our team, we’d be happy to assist you with putting together your own funding proposal, eihter through third-party funding bodies (European, Czech, or other) or through Czech University of Life Sciences funding programmes.
